title: Update statistics and contact location details

requirements.summary: Update projects completed statistic from '500+' to '100+' in About section
acceptanceCriteria: The statistics card showing projects completed displays '100+' instead of '500+'
The change is reflected in frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx at the element matching XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/div[1]

file_operations.description: Update the projects completed statistic from '500+' to '100+' in the second statistics card. Locate the card displaying project count and modify the text content while preserving all existing styling and layout.

requirements.summary: Update satisfied clients statistic from '1000+' to '200+' in About section
acceptanceCriteria: The statistics card showing satisfied clients displays '200+' instead of '1000+'
The change is reflected in frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx at the element matching XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[3]/div[1]

file_operations.description: Update the satisfied clients statistic from '1000+' to '200+' in the third statistics card. Locate the card displaying client count and modify the text content while preserving all existing styling and layout.

requirements.summary: Update Contact section location to display D-37, Block D, Radheypuri, Krishna Nagar, Delhi, 110051
acceptanceCriteria: The location address in the Contact section displays 'D-37, Block D, Radheypuri, Krishna Nagar, Delhi, 110051'

The change is reflected in frontend/src/components/ContactSection.tsx at the elements matching XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[7]/div[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/div[2]/div[1]/p[1] and /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[7]/div[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[3]/div[2]/div[1]/p[1]

file_operations.description: Update all location address displays to show 'D-37, Block D, Radheypuri, Krishna Nagar, Delhi, 110051' in the contact information cards. Locate the location text elements and replace the existing address while maintaining all styling and layout.

requirements.summary: Update Google Maps iframe to display Kapoor Builders & Co. location at coordinates 28.6575323, 77.2883587
acceptanceCriteria: The Google Maps embed in ContactSection.tsx displays the correct location for D-37, Block D, Radheypuri, Krishna Nagar, Delhi, 110051
The iframe src attribute uses the embed format with coordinates 28.6575323, 77.2883587 or the provided place ID

file_operations.description: Update the Google Maps iframe src attribute to use the embed format for Kapoor Builders & Co. at coordinates 28.6575323, 77.2883587. Convert the provided Google Maps URL to the proper embed format (https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=...) or use the place ID from the URL while preserving the iframe styling and dimensions.
